hasAttributes.name: ApprovedBy
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file (for person who approved the entry).

hasAttributes.name: ApprovedByDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: ApprovedByTime
hasAttributes.description: The time this transaction was entered into the system. ISO 8601 representing time in 24- hour time (hhmm) (for example, 1:00 PM = 1300).

hasAttributes.name: EnteredBy
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (User_Listing file) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: EnteredDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date. This should be a system-generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: EnteredTime
hasAttributes.description: The time this transaction was entered into the system. ISO 8601 representing time in 24- hour time (hhmm) (for example, 1:00 PM = 1300).

hasAttributes.name: BusinessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, and so on at the level that financial statements are being audited. Must match a Business_Unit_Code in the Business_Unit_Listing file.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetID
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier; may require a concatenation, such as Business_Unit_Code + Fixed_Asset_Code.

hasAttributes.name: SerialNumber
hasAttributes.description: Tracked by serial number. True or false.

hasAttributes.name: LastModifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file (for person who approved the entry).

hasAttributes.name: LastModifiedDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the entry was last modified.

hasAttributes.name: LastModifiedTime
hasAttributes.description: The time the last entry was modified. ISO 8601 representing time in 24-hour time (hhmm) (for example, 1:00 PM = 1300).

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetDepreciableBasis
hasAttributes.description: Depreciable basis of the fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetFairValue
hasAttributes.description: Fair value of the fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetReplacementCost
hasAttributes.description: Replacement cost of the fixed asset.

hasAttributes.name: GL Account
hasAttributes.description: GL Account for the depreciation posting.

hasAttributes.name: GL TransactionID
hasAttributes.description: Transaction ID in GL.

hasAttributes.name: LotNumber
hasAttributes.description: Tracked by lot number. True or false.

hasAttributes.name: UniqueID
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for the removal entry.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetDepreciationMethod
hasAttributes.description: Method used to calculate depreciation.

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetDepreciationAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount of depreciation recognized during the period.

hasAttributes.name: DepreciationEffectiveDate
hasAttributes.description: Accounting date of the depreciation

hasAttributes.name: DepreciationForPeriod
hasAttributes.description: Depreciation on asset in the period

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetSalvageValue
hasAttributes.description: Salvage value of the fixed asset.  At the point depreciatoin was calculated

hasAttributes.name: FixedAssetUsefulLife
hasAttributes.description: Total useful life of the fixed asset in months.  At the point depreciatoin was calculated
